about_the_game:
It's the Soundtrack of CHILDSTORY, in "320kbps MP3's" format. Over 37 tracks, for over 2 hours of music by "Велосипед до Токио", "Mitseliy", "MedDalV", "Iulaii", "Tim".

Recommended to buy. Maybe don't listen to it until you have finished the game.

Tracklist


00. Title - ChildStory OST. Велосипед до Токио (2:34)
